meals.name: Chicken Salad
meals.recipe: Mix all ingredients.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
meals.recipe: Stir fry vegetables and tofu.

meals.name: Grilled Salmon
meals.recipe: Grill the salmon with herbs.

meals.name: Quinoa Bowl
meals.recipe: Mix and serve.

meals.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
meals.recipe: Cook spaghetti and toss with garlic, olive oil, and red pepper flakes. Garnish with parsley.

meals.name: Cauliflower Tacos
meals.recipe: Roast cauliflower with taco seasoning and serve in tortillas with lettuce and sour cream.

meals.name: Beef Stir Fry
meals.recipe: Stir fry beef with vegetables, ginger, and garlic, and add soy sauce.

meals.name: Chicken Curry
meals.recipe: Cook chicken in curry powder, coconut milk, and tomatoes. Serve with rice.

meals.name: Greek Salad
meals.recipe: Mix cucumbers, tomatoes, feta, olives, and onion. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

meals.name: Vegetarian Burrito
meals.recipe: Layer rice, black beans, avocado, lettuce, cheese in tortillas and roll up.

meals.name: Eggplant Parmesan
meals.recipe: Bread and fry eggplant slices, top with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan. Bake with breadcrumbs.

meals.name: Lentil Soup
meals.recipe: Cook lentils with carrots, onions, garlic, and vegetable broth. Stir in spinach at the end.

meals.name: Shrimp Scampi
meals.recipe: Cook shrimp in garlic butter, add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over spaghetti.

meals.name: Vegetable Quiche
meals.recipe: Bake eggs with spinach, mushrooms, cheese, and onion in a pie crust.

meals.name: Chicken Fajitas
meals.recipe: Cook chicken with bell peppers and onions in fajita seasoning. Serve in tortillas.

meals.name: Avocado Toast
meals.recipe: Mash avocado with lemon juice and chili flakes. Spread on toasted bread with olive oil.

meals.name: Mushroom Risotto
meals.recipe: Cook rice with mushrooms, garlic, and onion. Add broth and cook until creamy. Stir in parmesan.

meals.name: Poke Bowl
meals.recipe: Top rice with tuna, avocado, cucumber, and seaweed. Drizzle with soy sauce.

meals.name: Tom Yum Soup
meals.recipe: Cook shrimp with lemongrass, galangal, lime leaves, and chili. Add mushrooms and fish sauce for flavor.

meals.name: Pasta Primavera
meals.recipe: Cook pasta and toss with saut√©ed garlic, zucchini, tomatoes, and olive oil. Top with parmesan.

meals.name: Chickpea Salad
meals.recipe: Mix chickpeas with cucumber, onion, tomato, and feta. Dress with olive oil and lemon.

meals.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
meals.recipe: Slow cook pork in BBQ sauce. Serve on buns with coleslaw.

meals.name: Falafel Wrap
meals.recipe: Fill pita bread with falafel, hummus, cucumber, tomato, and lettuce.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.recipe: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Serve in taco shells with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

meals.name: Sushi Rolls
meals.recipe: Roll sushi rice with tuna, avocado, and cucumber in nori. Serve with soy sauce.

meals.name: Sweet Potato Fries
meals.recipe: Cut sweet potatoes into fries, toss with olive oil, salt, and paprika. Bake until crispy.

meals.name: Baked Ziti
meals.recipe: Cook ziti pasta and toss with marinara sauce. Top with mozzarella and parmesan, then bake.

meals.name: Chia Pudding
meals.recipe: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, vanilla, and honey. Refrigerate overnight and top with berries.

meals.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
meals.recipe: Bread and fry chicken breast. Serve on buns with lettuce and pickles.

meals.name: Mango Salsa
meals.recipe: Chop mango, onion, and cilantro. Mix with lime juice and chili for a fresh salsa.

meals.name: Pasta Carbonara
meals.recipe: Cook spaghetti and toss with pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan. Season with black pepper.

meals.name: Tomato Basil Soup
meals.recipe: Cook tomatoes with garlic, onion, and basil. Puree and add cream for richness.
